options.command: if [ "$(uname -s)" != "Darwin" ]; then echo 'Skipping: wrong platform (need darwin)'; exit 0; fi && ./epsilon --module epsilon.darwin --eval t
if [ "$(uname -s)" != "Darwin" ]; then echo 'Skipping: wrong platform (need darwin)'; exit 0; fi && ./epsilon --test epsilon.darwin
if [ "$(uname -s)" != "Darwin" ]; then echo 'Skipping: wrong platform (need darwin)'; exit 0; fi && echo 'Lint: epsilon.darwin'
